description:
What is good code?

Every developer wants to write good code.
But it's hard to define what exactly is good code.

You can't define good code in every situation.
We've outlined the characteristics of good code based on web services.

In this presentation, you'll learn how to write good code,
I'm going to use Django as an example to make this as easy as possible.

When you're developing and you feel unproductive,
I hope I can organize my thoughts for a while and get some ideas.
We have prepared this presentation.

Jeonggyeong
A developer who has been using Django on the business for a long time to create and run web services. I've gone through several startups and domains and pursued sustainable development. Somehow, I've been a firefighter many times, and now I'm a freelancer.
title: PyCon KR 2023 Django Spring Is Coming Again
